alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 02 at 9:22AM MDT until August 04 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SCATTERED LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS, OWYHEE MOUNTAINS, AND WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM... .Storms are expected this afternoon and evening, leading to a Red Flag Warning for the Southern Highlands, Twin Falls BLM, and the Owyhee Mountains. In addition, a Fire Weather Watch remains in effect from Thursday afternoon through Friday evening for all but the NF districts, again due to scattered thunderstorms. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS... WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...424 AND 426... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS... WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423...424 AND 426... * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Up to 50 mph.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands; Western Twin Falls BLM
